document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d078ff">word </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44ff70">left </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d078ff">careless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44ff70">page </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">May </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#684044">consecrate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d078ff">eye, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d078ff">folded </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d078ff">perpetual </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d078ff">seam </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d078ff">wrinkled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d078ff">author </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#50d0ff">lie. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
